import React from "react"; import Slider from "react-slick"; import ava01 from "../../assets/images/ava-1.jpg"; import ava02 from "../../assets/images/ava-2.jpg"; import ava03 from "../../assets/images/ava-3.jpg"; import ava04 from "../../assets/images/ava-4.jpg"; const Testimonials = () => { const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, autoplay: true, speed: 1000, swipeToSlide: true, autoplaySpeed: 2000, slidesToShow: 3, responsive: [ { breakpoint: 992, settings: { slidesToShow: 2, slidesToScroll: 1, infinite: true, dots: true, }, breakpoint: 576, settings: { slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, infinite: true, dots: true, }, }, ], }; return (

"Your appointment booking system exceeded my expectations! From start to finish, it was a seamless process. I appreciated how easy it was to find availability and schedule my appointments without any hassle. Thanks to your platform, managing my healthcare has never been more convenient."

John Doe

Customer

"I'm so impressed with the efficiency of your appointment booking system. It saved me so much time and effort. I was able to quickly secure the appointments I needed without any stress or complications. Thank you for streamlining the process and making it so user-friendly!"

Lia Franklin

Customer

"I just had to share how amazing my experience was with your appointment booking system. It's incredibly intuitive and user-friendly. I was able to navigate through the options effortlessly and book my appointments with ease. It's definitely the gold standard for healthcare scheduling!"

Micheal

Customer

"I can't thank you enough for making appointment booking so effortless. Your system is a game-changer! It's incredibly convenient and user-friendly, allowing me to schedule my appointments quickly and efficiently. I'm beyond impressed with how seamless the entire process was."

Blakley

Customer

 ); }; export default Testimonials;
